language.name: english
language.l: BabyNotify.com - Notify Family And Friends Of Your New Arrival With One Click
Manage your account and your notification list
See all arrivals announced through BabyNotify
Need Help? Click here to go to our help section
Create a new account on BabyNotify
Sign in to your existing BabyNotify account
Download the BabyNotify App for your Mobile Device
For Doctors, Hospitals and Service Providers
There was an error with your E-Mail/Password combination. Please try again.
Your account was disabled. Please contact customer support.
The authorization token has expired or is invalid.
Click here to send your notification!
contact(s) are in your Notification List
Enter the information below and complete it when your new arrival is here.
Click the button to change your password.
You can reset your account if you need to. [b]Note:[/b] All data will be removed.
You can close your account if you don't need it anymore.
If you specify a due date we will show a small countdown widget on the top right corner.
Publish your announcement on the BabyNotify Twitter
If checked, we will tweet the news of your new arrival on the BabyNotify Twitter account. [a href="http://twitter.com/babynotify" target="_blank"]Go to the BabyNotify Twitter[/a]
Allow the public to see my Baby Profile on BabyNotify Babies

If checked, your Baby Profile will be listed on BabyNotify Babies. If you don\'t choose this option, your Baby Profile will only be privately accessible. [a href="/babies" target="_blank"]Go to the BabyNotify Babies[/a]
Your Notify List is connected to %s
Your Notify List is not connected to %s
This contact could not be added. Please try again later.
This contact will be notified via a text message if a valid phone number is provided.
Do you want to remove the selected contact?
Please enter a name and an e-mail or phone number for this contact
Ready to send out your notification?

Make sure you have finalized your notification. You cannot make any changes to your notification once you have submitted it.[br/][br/]If you are not ready, click the [strong]Cancel[/strong] button to exit this dialog.

By clicking the button [b]Send Notification[/b], BabyNotify will send your notification to your Notification List and update your connected social services. You will not be able to send this notification again. By confirming this box you agree to our [a href="/terms" target="_blank"]Terms and Conditions[/a].
Please enter the correct result of the equation. Shouldn\'t be that difficult.
To send your notification please select the baby's gender and enter the parent(s) name.
The most common reason is that your notification is already scheduled or sent but our records are not updated yet. We are notified of this problem and are looking into it.
Your Notification was successfully scheduled. It can take up to 30 minutes until your notification is processed. You will receive an e-mail confirmation that your notification has been sent.
Your Notification is scheduled and will be processed shortly.
Click the button below to check the status of your notification.
Congratulations. Your Notification was successfully sent to your contact list and connected services.
Please enter your new password and confirm it.
Your password must have at least 4 characters.
You can import contacts from different services. Click one of the services below to get started.
Select the contacts below you want to import to your registry and click the button [b]Import[/b] when ready.
The selected contacts could not be imported.
Do you really want to reset your account?[br/][br/][strong]Note:[/strong] Your data will be permanently erased.
Your notification was successfully sent and your Baby Profile is now active.
Copy and paste the link below and share it with anyone.
Your Baby Profile is currently publicly accessible
Your Baby Profile is publicly listed in [a href="/babies" target="_blank"]BabyNotify Babies[/a]
Your Baby Profile is currently only privately accessible
Anyone with the link above can access your Baby Profile. Your profile is not publicly listed.
Four Easy Steps to get started!
1. Import your contacts and connect your social services.
3. Customize your announcement with themes and colors.
4. On delivery day, take or upload a photo, add birth details and send your notification. Download the BabyNotify Mobile App for added convenience.
Enter or calculate it and click [b]Next[/b] to continue
Do you know the gender of your new arrival already?
Select from the options below and click [b]Next[/b] to continue
Enter the details below and click [b]Next[/b] to continue
Congratulations your account is now active
This wizard will guide you through some basic settings for BabyNotify. Click [b]Next[/b] to continue.
The selected file is not an image (%s). Please make sure that your picture is either in JPEG or PNG format.
Use an [a href="http://www.online-utility.org/image_converter.jsp" target="_blank"]online converter[/a] to reformat your image.
The selected file is exceeding the upload limit of %s (Uploaded Size: %s).
How do you want to calculate your due date?
Based on first day of the last menstrual period:
Based on your entered date your approximatly due date is:
The requested service does not exists!
The requested service [b]%s[/b] could not be located.

You received this message because you were on a baby notification list at [a href="http://www.babynotify.com" target="_blank"]BabyNotify.com[/a]. We will never use your e-mail address other than for this notification.
%s announcing the arrival of %s born on %s

This message was sent to [strong]{toemailaddress}[/strong]. Please do not reply to this message; it was sent from an unmonitored email address. This message is a service email related to your use of [a href="http://www.babynotify.com" target="_blank"]BabyNotify[/a].
Download the BabyNotify Mobile App for your phone or tablet.
Meet the babies that have been announced through BabyNotify[span]*[/span]
*Parents can choose if they want their arrival publicly displayed on BabyNotify Baby.
This is a preview of your Baby Profile.
You can delete a comment by clicking [strong]Remove[/strong].
You need to fill out all fields and provide a valid e-mail address.[br/][br/]Don't worry, we will never use your e-mail address for spam or sell it.
Hmm... Seems like you have an auto-filler plugin activated in your browser or you are an Spammer. Either way, we can not accept your comment at this time.
Do you really want to remove this comment?
Just send an e-mail to [a href="mailto:support@babynotify.com"]support@babynotify.com[/a] with your request.
